report.title: Sample thanks
report.description: Lists info in a sample for the thank you page.
report.query: select o.id, cttl.taxon, cttl.preferred_taxon, cttl.default_common_name, cttl.external_key from cache_occurrences_functional o join cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl on cttl.id=o.taxa_taxon_list_id where o.sample_id=#sample_id#
